content:
Dear all,
I try to create a page with history of version of my IG, but I cant create, I dont know how to do it! I want to create like this example of USCORE guide image.png ( http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/history.html )
I hope that you can help me.
My IG is https://hl7chile.cl/fhir/ig/CoreCL/
Best from Chile

Hi @Jorge Mansilla. This question is actually outside the scope of FSH. The way you would do it in a FSH project is the same as any other IG project (with or without FSH). For that reason, I would suggest posting this question in the #IG creation stream instead.

That said, my understanding is that the HL7 FHIR publication team actually builds and maintains the history page (assuming this is an HL7 IG). I believe that happens at the time of your first publication (probably a ballot?). I expect you can get more information over in #IG creation.
Thank you, I will move to correct topic
